appearance.control.gmailFixExplanation: The Gmail App for Android has a built-in function for customizing emails for mobile devices, but different versions of the app show different results with the same email.
appearance.description.adapt: The following settings will only work in the mobile version of the message in e-mail programs that support adaptivity.

nifty.explanation:
Block "Timer" is developed and provided with the support of third-party service niftyimages.com solely for the purpose of review.

We will be able to guarantee the quality of the work of the "Timer" block only when registering a paid subscription, which will be possible in the beginning of this autumn.
mobileInversionOfContainersControl.label: Containers inversion on mobile
adaptContainersControl.label: Adaptive structure
adaptContainersControl.explanation.on: Containers of the structure will be located one below the other on mobile devices.
adaptContainersControl.explanation.off: Containers of the structure will be located in one row on mobile devices. This can lead to incorrect display when content with a large width (large words, etc.).

htmlCopyWarning:
Please use the «Export» feature to get the compiled HTML code ready for mailings via your ESP.
HTML code is displayed within editor only for editing purposes and doesn't have compiled styles for your convenience.

imgAdditionalPictureControl.label: Rollover effect

imgAdditionalPictureControl.caution: The aspect ratio of the secondary image differs from the primary one. For correct feature work please edit the size of secondary image!
imgAdditionalPictureControl.compatibilit: This feature works in limited number of email services: Yahoo! Mail, Ukr.net, AOL, Gmail, iCloud Mail, Outlook 2003, MacOS Apple Mail.
